org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.couchdb.dialect.backend.facade.impl

Interface ServerClient


  • @Path(value="/")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public interface ServerClient
    * The Interface used by RESTEasy to create the REST calls used to interact with the CouchDB server
    Author:
    Andrea Boriero <dreborier@gmail.com>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response createDatabase(String databaseName)
      Create a new database
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getAllDatabaseNames()
      Retrieve the name of all the databases on the CouchDBServer

    • Method Detail

      • createDatabase

        @PUT
 @Path(value="{name}")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response createDatabase(@PathParam(value="name")
                                                                     String databaseName)
        Create a new database
        Parameters:
        databaseName - the name of the new database
        Returns:
        the Response

      • getAllDatabaseNames

        @GET
 @Path(value="_all_dbs")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response getAllDatabaseNames()
        Retrieve the name of all the databases on the CouchDBServer
        Returns:
        the ClientResponse with the list of the names of the existing databases
